oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Foy Willing And The Riders Of The Purple Sage - Cain's Coffee show - Unknown date
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage radio program sponsored by Cain's Coffee. Broadcast and record dates unknown. Featuring Foy Willing, Al Sloey, Scotty Harrel, Bud Sievert, Jerry Vaughn, and Johnny Paul.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer opening statement -- Theme -- Opening statement (Foy Willing) -- When The Bloom Is On The Sage -- Foy Willing talks -- Lay Your Little Head On My Shoulder -- Cain's Coffee commercial -- I Couldn't Believe It Was True -- Foy Willing and Al Sloey talk -- You're The Only Star In My Blue Heaven -- Cain's Coffee commercial -- Foy Willing talks -- Blue Shadows On The Trail -- Cain's Coffee commercial -- Theme -- Closing statement (Foy Willing) -- Announcer closing statement
